net.tmachine.gpg.hue
Class MainRenderer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              net.tmachine.gpg.hue.MainRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class MainRenderer
extends javax.swing.JComponent

A very simple main renderer that simply grabs a paint surface on every repaint (managed by Sun's windowing system, "Swing") and gets each visible HUD to paint to that surface in turn.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
MainRenderer()
          Creates a renderer; you MUST call setManager() afterwards before using the renderer, otherwise it won't be able to get hold of any HUDs to render!
